Go ahead...I'm sure that private use is okay...seeing how there are
tons of RK wallpapers all over the internet.

***if you guys notice I put our webaddresses on the pic so I probably
won't win anything (and I told them I just wanted to participate I
don't want a prize)...but if they display it somewhere we get free
advertisement.


--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista"
<mg_batt@y...> wrote:
> I LOVE IT! Hey... So this is your gift ne? :O)
> I'm not sure about the laws about this but do you think I can use it 
> on my desktop at work? Can I use it after the contest (or earlier if 
> possible)...
> 
> Last month my pic was all the real faces of the members of the 
> Shinsengumi and people including my boss kept stopping by asking who 
> they were... Then I'd go on a long explanation.. Basically giving 
> them a history lesson. The good thing about it is that they seem to 
> appreciate the lesson...
> 
> This pic could make a good conversational piece about the SHQ group 
> too... Let me know! ^_^
> 
> --- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "Tiffany" <tnamwong@h...> 
> wrote:
> > I submitted fanart to the contest Angrybee informed us about
> > Pic
> > http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/PMKSH1.jpg
> > Title: Saitou Hajime:Bored as Usual
> > Media: overhead projecter marker
> > Note I made him left-handed just because I think historical Saitou 
> was
> > left handed.  The mon/kamon in the background is historical Fujita
> > Goro's family crest (nine bamboo leaves).
> > 
> > I think his head is a bit big...and he looks like he used the 
> entire
> > can of hairspray...but its not like I can white it out or anything.
